headline: What Catalysts Are Shifting The Narrative For Avery Dennison (AVY)?
summary: The latest Avery Dennison update shows a slightly higher analyst fair value estimate, moving from US$206.80 to US$211.90. The discount rate and revenue growth assumptions have been adjusted to reflect a balance between long term growth drivers and more cautious views on near term packaging volumes. Bulls are pointing to supportive trends around intelligent labels and steady demand signals across key packaging categories, while more cautious voices are flagging the risk that volumes could stay...
